attributes.action: create a national holiday on 23rd April to honour the birth of William Shakespeare, our greatest playwright
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: and poet whose words are as relevant today as they were 400 years ago.  His plays and poetry have an international, timeless appeal and it is only fitting that he should be commemorated in the country of his birth - he is an Englishman we can all be proud of and we should celebrate his unique contribution to our culture,our country and the world.
